pr_title: Print collection contents in case of failure

timeline.message: print collection contents in case of failure

timeline.bodyText: Can we add this to assertCollection method ?
timeline.author: eminn

replies.bodyText: you mean to have it on IMDG side or overwrite it on our side ?
replies.author: gurbuzali

replies.bodyText: I thought it comes from JetAssert but still we can improve the one in IMDG to print contents when the size is not equal
replies.author: eminn

replies.bodyText: I've put it to JetTestSupport for now, after the change on IMDG side we can remove it
replies.author: gurbuzali

timeline.message: overwrite assertCollection in JetTestSupport to print the contents of the collections in case of failure
